description.displayText: She is the best!! My family is in love with Sandy from day 1. She is responsible, fun, and really trustworthy. She takes direction well but also will give input and provide ideas that are well suited for your children and family. You would be lucky to have Sandy in your home!!
description.originalText: She is the best!! My family is in love with Sandy from day 1. She is responsible, fun, and really trustworthy. She takes direction well but also will give input and provide ideas that are well suited for your children and family. You would be lucky to have Sandy in your home!!

description.displayText: We hired Asanta when our baby girl was born. She took care of both our baby and our 2.5 year old son. She loved them and treated them as her own. Asanta was also amazing at setting up play dates and getting my shy son to socialize, something we will miss. I always knew my babies were loved, cared for and having fun when they were with her. If you're looking for an experienced nanny, who will genuinely enjoy hanging out with your kids and looking after them I recommend her.
description.originalText: We hired Asanta when our baby girl was born. She took care of both our baby and our 2.5 year old son. She loved them and treated them as her own. Asanta was also amazing at setting up play dates and getting my shy son to socialize, something we will miss. I always knew my babies were loved, cared for and having fun when they were with her. If you're looking for an experienced nanny, who will genuinely enjoy hanging out with your kids and looking after them I recommend her.

description.displayText:
Asanta is not your run of the mill nanny. She is intelligent, nurturing, skilled in advanced care of infants to grade school aged children. She goes above and beyond in nutrition and all around child development. 

She takes initiative and recommends educational materials but will also take your directions and adapt to your style. 

She raised my now 12 year old from birth to kindergarten and has continued with us over the years when her schedule allows. During that time she also nurtured and cared for his older brother by 2 years. 

She is amazing!!!
